template.description: This flow brings initial and incremental data from Mysql db and dumps data to S3 object. Also dumps _Success file to S3 object for success dump for a period.
template.name: MysqlToS3

entry.value:
flowf=session.get() count=flowf.getAttribute("fragment.count") session.rollback() tableDict={} flowFiles = session.get(count) tableDict[flowf.getAttribute("generatetablefetch.tableName")]=1 session.remove(flowf)
for ff in flowFiles: name=ff.getAttribute("generatetablefetch.tableName") value=tableDict.get(name,0)+1 tableDict[name]=value session.remove(ff) for name,value in tableDict.items(): newflow=session.create() newflow=session.putAttribute(newflow,"generatetablefetch.tableName",name) newflow=session.putAttribute(newflow,"numberOfFiles",value) session.transfer(newflow, REL_SUCCESS)
session.commit()

import json
flowFile = session.get() configFilePath=ConfigFilePath.getValue() with open(configFilePath) as json_file: tableDetails=json.load(json_file)
if (flowFile != None): attr=flowFile.getAttribute("db.table.name") if tableDetails.get(attr): flowFile=session.putAttribute(flowFile,"columnName",tableDetails.get(attr).get("columnName")) flowFile=session.putAttribute(flowFile,"lastMaxValue",tableDetails.get(attr).get("lastMaxValue"))
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) session.commit()

flowFile = session.get() if (flowFile != None):
tableName=flowFile.getAttribute("generatetablefetch.tableName") identifier=flowFile.getAttribute("fragment.identifier") index=flowFile.getAttribute("fragment.index") count=flowFile.getAttribute("fragment.count") multipleflow=[] newflow=session.create()
newflow=session.putAttribute(newflow,"generatetablefetch.tableName",tableName) newflow=session.putAttribute(newflow,"fragment.identifier",identifier) newflow=session.putAttribute(newflow,"fragment.index",index) newflow=session.putAttribute(newflow,"fragment.count",count) dublicateFlow=newflow if count ==1: newflow=session.putAttribute(newflow,"filename","_Success") session.transfer(newflow,REL_SUCCESS) session.remove(flowFile) session.commit()
